original_text: They worshiped the Lord, but they also served their own gods in accordance with the customs of the nations from which they had been brought.
korean_text: 이와 같이 그들이 여호와도 경외하고 또한 어디서부터 옮겨왔든지 그 민족의 풍속대로 자기의 신들도 섬겼더라

sentences.original_text: but they also served their own gods
in accordance with the customs of the nations
from which they had been brought
